title: Brizzit

[[File:Brizzit.png|thumb|right|Brizzit]] '''Species:''' Brizzit
'''Home Planet:''' [[Jandoon]] (Colony)

'''Brizzit'''
The Brizzit were a insectoid sentient species, difficult to identify by name and face. [[Tzizvvt]] was a Brizzit. Although he had been treasure hunting on [[Jandoon]], that was not his homeworld; though there was a colony of Brizzit established there.

'''''Attribute Dice:''''' 12D
DEXTERITY 2D/4D
KNOWLEDGE 2D/4D
MECHANICAL 2D/4D
PERCEPTION 2D/4D
STRENGTH 2D/4D
TECHNICAL 2D/4D

'''Special Abilities:'''
*None Known

'''Move:''' 10/12
'''Size:''' Medium
'''Source:''' Wookieepedia (For the Brizzit Description)
